DOC.detailed_description: Study design : The study design randomize , cross-over parallel , open study . Study population : The number subject participate study 32 , healthy , lean obese men , age 18-45 year . Intervention : intervention last four week : - High Vegetable treatment : consumption 200 gram vegetable daily ; - Low Vegetable treatment : consumption 50 gram vegetable daily ; - An energy restrict diet intervention habitual vegetable consumption . Main study parameters/endpoints : A 'challenge test ' use physical stress test examine whether subject show less resilience test . The reaction recovery human system exercise test may use indicator health status different biological analysis ( transcriptomics ; metabolomics ; rule base medicine pm ) . Different analysis measure oxidative stress perform . Also standard health biomarkers determine examine intervention effect .
